<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"Hannotate SC Regular";mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:#393939;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">按：这是我给公司（部门）写的使用推广<span lang="EN-US">Go</span>语言的建议书，给领导看了以后，领导同意使用<span lang="EN-US">Go</span>语言对一些服务器程序进行改写并部署到外网进行验证。希望这篇文章能够给同样在自己公司内部推广<span lang="EN-US">Go</span>语言的技术人员有一些帮助。同时如果发现文章中有疏漏不足错误之处也欢迎提出。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Regular";mso-bidi-font-family:
宋体;color:#393939;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align:center;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"Hannotate SC Regular";mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:#393939;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">采用<span lang="EN-US">Go</span>语言作为服务端编程语言的建议书<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align:center;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Regular";mso-bidi-font-family:
宋体;color:#393939;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 28pt; text-indent: -28pt;"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Regular";
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:#393939;mso-font-kerning:0pt">一、当前的挑战<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 28pt; text-indent: -28pt;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Regular";
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:#393939;mso-font-kerning:0pt">        
</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Regular";
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:#393939;mso-font-kerning:0pt">随着互联网时代的到来，软件（特别是网络游戏）版本更新产品更迭的速度也在加快，这对软件开发效率和质量提出了更高的要求。只有更快更好更多地拿出产品，软件公司才能在市场上取得一席之地。随着我们公司的战略从端游转向页游和手游，加快产品开发的需求也更加迫切。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 28pt; text-indent: -28pt;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Regular";
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:#393939;mso-font-kerning:0pt">        
</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Regular";
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:#393939;mso-font-kerning:0pt">目前我们公司的主要开发语言仍为<span lang="EN-US">C++</span>。确实在端游领域，<span lang="EN-US">C++</span>作为客户端的开发语言是不二之选；但是在服务器端，<span lang="EN-US">C++</span>作为编程语言越来越力不从心，我相信在进入页游和手游市场之后，这个问题将会越发严重。<span lang="EN-US">C++</span>作为服务端的编程语言，存在如下主要问题：<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 52pt; text-indent: -52pt;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Regular";
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:#393939;mso-font-kerning:0pt">1.</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Regular";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#393939;mso-font-kerning:0pt">      </span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Regular";
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:#393939;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Regular";mso-bidi-font-family:
宋体;color:#393939;mso-font-kerning:0pt">开发效率低<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 84pt; text-indent: -84pt;"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Regular";
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:#393939;mso-font-kerning:0pt">这个已多有讨论，相信有几年编程经验的<span lang="EN-US">C++</span>程序员都会有体会。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 52pt; text-indent: -52pt;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Regular";
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:#393939;mso-font-kerning:0pt">2.</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Regular";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#393939;mso-font-kerning:0pt">      </span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Regular";
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:#393939;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Regular";mso-bidi-font-family:
宋体;color:#393939;mso-font-kerning:0pt">常见<span lang="EN-US">BUG</span>多<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 84pt; text-indent: -84pt;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Regular";
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:#393939;mso-font-kerning:0pt">C++</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Regular";mso-bidi-font-family:
宋体;color:#393939;mso-font-kerning:0pt">编程中，内存越界、非法内存引用、内存泄漏、非法类型转换等都是常见的<span lang="EN-US">BUG</span>，在每个新人每个项目的成长过程中基本都会重复遇到，严重降低了产品的质量和稳定性。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 52pt; text-indent: -52pt;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Regular";
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:#393939;mso-font-kerning:0pt">3.</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Regular";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#393939;mso-font-kerning:0pt">      </span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Regular";
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:#393939;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Regular";mso-bidi-font-family:
宋体;color:#393939;mso-font-kerning:0pt">软件工程<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 84pt; text-indent: -84pt;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Regular";
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:#393939;mso-font-kerning:0pt">C++</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Regular";mso-bidi-font-family:
宋体;color:#393939;mso-font-kerning:0pt">对软件工程的支持不够好，例如很不方便的代码重用、复杂的库依赖、五花八门的代码风格、缺乏良好的单元测试设施、不同的编译器甚至不同版本之间的不兼容特性、冗长的编译时间、贫乏的文档化支持等。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 52pt; text-indent: -52pt;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Regular";

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 84pt; text-indent: -84pt;"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Regular";
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:#393939;mso-font-kerning:0pt">虽然<span lang="EN-US">C++</span>的库很丰富，但是标准库的功能却很贫乏。既没有正则表达式、也没有加密压缩算法、没有序列化支持、没有<span lang="EN-US">WEB</span>支持、没有邮件等支持。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:#393939;mso-font-kerning:0pt">虽然<span lang="EN-US">C++</span>可以在多个操作系统上编译，但是各个厂商的编译器对<span lang="EN-US">C++</span>标准的支持不尽相同；标准库的接口也不尽相同；甚至<span lang="EN-US">C++</span>对操作系统的统一化处理也支持不好，例如不同平台上的文件路径的处理。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 84pt; text-indent: -84pt;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Regular";

宋体;color:#393939;mso-font-kerning:0pt">是一门非常复杂的语言，即使是三年编程经验的程序员也不敢说能掌握<span lang="EN-US">C++</span>知识的多少。现在我们公司的<span lang="EN-US">C++</span>程序员，能看模板代码的有多少？自己能写的又有多少？这导致程序员培训的成本，程序员成长的成本非常非常的高。而众多低水平程序员用容易出错的<span lang="EN-US">C++</span>写出来代码质量又能有多高？<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Regular";mso-bidi-font-family:
宋体;color:#393939;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 28pt; text-indent: -28pt;"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Regular";
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:#393939;mso-font-kerning:0pt">七、目前我对<span lang="EN-US">Go</span>语言编程的实践和感受<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 28pt; text-indent: -28pt;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Regular";
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:#393939;mso-font-kerning:0pt">        
</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Regular";
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:#393939;mso-font-kerning:0pt">目前我已经实现了一个从<span lang="EN-US">SPR</span>中提取<span lang="EN-US">PNG</span>的工具，已经在版本发布的打包流程中实际使用，运行良好；另外出于验证性的目的，用<span lang="EN-US">Go</span>语言改写了玩家登录服务器程序，未投入外网使用。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 28pt; text-indent: -28pt;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Regular";
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:#393939;mso-font-kerning:0pt">        
</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Regular";
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:#393939;mso-font-kerning:0pt">我的主要感受是：<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 52pt; text-indent: -52pt;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Regular";
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:#393939;mso-font-kerning:0pt">1.</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Regular";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#393939;mso-font-kerning:0pt">      </span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Regular";
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:#393939;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> Go</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Regular";mso-bidi-font-family:
宋体;color:#393939;mso-font-kerning:0pt">语言来写代码非常的简洁。特别是原来玩家登录服务器中复杂的异步处理和状态检查，用<span lang="EN-US">Go</span>语言中用阻塞式顺序执行的流程很简单就实现了，业务逻辑处理一目了然非常清晰，不用再竭尽脑力去考虑有没有什么状态忘了处理，导致卡号重复登录等<span lang="EN-US">BUG</span>。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 52pt; text-indent: -52pt;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Regular";
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:#393939;mso-font-kerning:0pt">2.</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Regular";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#393939;mso-font-kerning:0pt">      </span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Regular";
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:#393939;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> Go</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Regular";mso-bidi-font-family:
宋体;color:#393939;mso-font-kerning:0pt">语言很容易实现代码重用。用<span lang="EN-US">C++</span>写工具都需要去主工程里抠代码然后拷贝粘贴到新的工程，但是在<span lang="EN-US">Go</span>语言里，通过包管理机制和非侵入式接口，代码重用很容易就实现了。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 52pt; text-indent: -52pt;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Regular";
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:#393939;mso-font-kerning:0pt">        
</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Regular";
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:#393939;mso-font-kerning:0pt">下一个实践内容是打算用<span lang="EN-US">Go</span>语言实现机器人测试工具。项目内先后曾经有过多个机器人，但是都废弃了。一个主要原因是不好用，占用内存和<span lang="EN-US">CPU</span>高，一台物理机跑不了几个机器人；因为用的少，代码也慢慢没有人维护了，现在是否能编译通过还是一个问题。但是如果用<span lang="EN-US">Go</span>语言支持高并发的特性可以很好地用于实现机器人，甚至还很容易实现几个机器人之间的交互，因此可以用机器人来测试玩家交易等有交互性的功能。这个机器人实现以后，可以比较容易地用于性能测试。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 52pt; text-indent: -52pt;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Regular";
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:#393939;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 28pt; text-indent: -28pt;"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Regular";
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:#393939;mso-font-kerning:0pt">八、结语<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 28pt; text-indent: -28pt;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Regular";
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:#393939;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Go</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Regular";mso-bidi-font-family:
宋体;color:#393939;mso-font-kerning:0pt">是一门出身名门、很有前途的通用性编程语言，特别适合于多核时代的服务器端开发，被誉为是互联网时代的<span lang="EN-US">C</span>语言；此外它改进了<span lang="EN-US">C/C++</span>语言的许多不足之处，在软件工程上也提供了优秀的支持。使用<span lang="EN-US">Go</span>语言，能够更快更好地开发出软件产品。现阶段，<span lang="EN-US">Go</span>语言还不能完全立刻替换掉<span lang="EN-US">C++</span>语言作为公司的主要开发语言，但是我建议公司能够早日对<span lang="EN-US">Go</span>语言进行考察使用，并推广到需要的项目和产品中去。<span lang="EN-US"> <o:p></o:p></span></span></p>
